title: Reconnect but im not in game

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Dafuq is this its annoying been like this for like 20 minutes now anyone know a fix? my whole team dcd in game and my pre says he has the same issue, also it seemed to only be our team that dcd.
